Iterator Maven Plugin

Overview

The invoker goal is intended to call a separate instance of Maven.

Different folder

You can change the working directory for the maven call by using:

  ..  
  <baseDirector>some-folder/@item@</baseDirector>
  ..

// cd @item@ // mvn clean package request.setBaseDirectory(getBaseDirectoryAfterPlaceHolderIsReplaced(currentValue)); // goals: // mvn plugin-name:@item@ // request.setGoals(getGoalsAfterPlaceHolderIsReplaced(currentValue)); // Profiles: // mvn -Pxyz-@item@ clean package // mvn -P@item@ request.setProfiles(getProfilesAfterPlaceHolderIsReplaced(currentValue)); // Projects: // mvn -pl xyz-@item@ clean package request.setProjects(getProjectsAfterPlaceHolderIsReplaced(currentValue));
